name: Rebel Flagship
desc: Being the flagship of the Rebel Alliance it possesses %s bonus weapon range and improved sensor arrays with %s more power.

name: Blockade Runner
desc: This ship was built to evade the blockades set by the Empire. As such it has %s increased maneuverability and is able to benefit from the zero flux speed bonus at up to %s of the ship's maximum flux capacity.
short: Increased handling and increased zero flux bonus levels

name: Republic Attack Cruiser
desc: An Attack Cruiser built by the Republic for the purpose of carrying as many fighters as possible. Boasts %s faster fighter refit times plus %s additional fighter bays.
short: Faster fighter refit, increased fighter bays
